course_content.core: Applied Knowledge (3 Papers) The Applied Knowledge exams provide students with a broad introduction to the world of finance and develop students essential understanding and techniques in accounting. BT Business and Technology MA Management Accounting FA Financial Accounting  Applied Skills (6 Papers) The Applied Skills exams build on existing knowledge and understanding while developing strong, broad and practical finance skills required for future strategic professional accountant in any sector or industry. LW Corporate & Business Law* PM Performance Management TX Taxation* FR Financial Reporting AA Audit & Assurance FM Financial Management * LW and TX are offered in Malaysia variant Strategic Professional (4 Papers) Strategic Professional (4 Papers) The Strategic Professional exams prepare students for future leadership positions. They develop the strategic vision using students unique blend of technical, ethical and professional skills. Students can specialise in areas that best suit their career ambitions. Students must complete both Essentials exams and choose two of the options. Essentials SBL Strategic Business Leader SBR Strategic Business Reporting Options (Choose 2) AFM Advanced Financial Management APM Advanced Performance Management ATX Advanced Taxation* AAA Advanced Audit & Assurance * ATX is offered in Malaysia variant Ethics and Professional Skills Ethics and Professional Skills Module (EPSM) Ethics and Professional Skills Module (EPSM) EPSM is an online learning module that tests students decision making and behaviour in a number of real-world business scenarios. The module uses realistic business simulations to develop a number of professional skills such as leadership, communication and commercial awareness.
